about_the_game:
🧩 A Cozy Jigsaw Puzzle Game for Everyone

If you like puzzles, this one’s for you. It has over 100 beautiful pictures in different styles—some colorful and fun, others peaceful and calming. There’s no rush, no timers, just a simple and relaxing way to spend your time.

  • 💡 Easy to play – Just pick a picture and start putting the pieces together. No complicated menus, no pressure.

  • 🎨 Lots of variety – From detailed artwork to soft, cozy scenes, there’s something for every mood.

  • 🎵 Relaxing music & sounds – Different music styles and ambient sounds to help you focus and unwind.

  • 🌿 A stress-free experience – Play at your own pace, take a break whenever you want, and enjoy the moment.

Whether you want a quick puzzle session or something to help you relax after a long day, this game is here for you. Just sit back, put the pieces together, and have a good time. 😊
